process-nextick-args

npm install --save process-nextick-args

Always be able to pass arguments to process.nextTick, no matter the platform

var nextTick = require('process-nextick-args');

nextTick(function (a, b, c) {
  console.log(a, b, c);
}, 'step', 3,  'profit');
